snippet.title: Beats of Betrayal - "Steam Next Fest: June 2024" Trailer
snippet.description:
Beats of Betrayal is an adventure game with roguelike mechanics and rhythm-based combat. Explore dungeons, gain skills and grow stronger to defeat challenging bosses and unlock the secrets surrounding the 'Power of the Waves'!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2761340/Beats_of_Betrayal/
Discord: https://beatsofbetrayal.com/discord
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BeatsOfBetrayal
Website: https://beatsofbetrayal.com/

The game is registered to participate in the Steam Next Fest: June 2024!
Support us by visiting during the Fest and maybe catch one of our stream sections.

#BeatsOfBetrayal #SteamNextFest #IndieGame #RhythmGame #Roguelike #Pixelart
